title: How to tell if your baby is bonded to you - Quora

response.answer_text: I am no doctor and do not claim to know everything about it but from my own experiences with my sons and from everything I have read about babies etc I believe you know if you are bonding because they will look you in the eyes. Be comforted by your voice, smell and touch. If you dont notice these things happening spend as much time as possible holding your baby and talking to them. If there is still nothing then you may be dealing with sight or hearing problems or autism of some sort.
Oh, you will know! Your baby will start going through phases where only YOU will do! She will not want to be held or comforted by anyone else. So, enjoy the stages where she will let others hold her!
